main event: A report from the U.S. Air Force regarding a claim that a radio allegedly from a crashed flying disc in New Mexico was in possession of an individual.
interesting points: The individual claimed to have pieces of cloth and metal from the crashed disc., The report mentions a golf outing where the claims were discussed., There were efforts to identify the individual and verify the claims., Radio news commentator ridiculed the claims, which possibly deterred the witness from cooperating., The investigation was closed due to lack of cooperation and credible evidence.
sighted object: allegedly a flying disc that crashed in New Mexico
witness description: individual who claimed to possess a radio from the disc and had been spoken to at a golf club
